cards.title: Projects
cards.description: As of right now, most of the listed projects do not have active links until I make them publicly accessible. Please note that the code involved with these examples was never intended to be shown publicly, as I made them to test my knowledge of new concepts while in college. Given more time, I would like to continue development and get these projects to a higher standard.

cards.title: Neural Network in C++
cards.description: Here's a neural network I wrote from scratch in C++.

cards.title: Various Cybersecurity Challenges
cards.description: Here are the solutions I came up with for several cybersecurity challenges I have encountered at Clarkson and online.

cards.title: Playable 3d Chess in Python
cards.description: Here's a playable 3d chess game I made in Python using an OpenGL library. I have not yet posted this project online, but it will soon link to the repository.

cards.title: End-to-End Encrypted Chat in Python (In Progress)
cards.description: I have not yet posted this project publicly; I hope to get it posted soon, stay tuned!

cards.title: Compiler in C (In Progress)
cards.description: Here is the beginning code of a pascal compiler written in C. This one is not posted yet, either, but I am hoping to get it ready soon.
